text.div:
VhDir Insurance Plan Benefit Cost Type

This value set defines a set of codes that indicate the cost for a particular benefit on a plan.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/vhdir/CodeSystem/insuranceplan
    CodeDisplay
    copayCopayCopay
    individualcapIndividual capIndividual cap
    familycapFamily capFamily cap
    coinsuranceCoinsuranceCoinsurance
    deductibleDeductibleDeductible
    in-networkIn-networkIn-network
    out-of-networkOut-of-networkOut-of-network
    otherOtherOther

name: VhDirInsPlanBenefitCostType
title: VhDir Insurance Plan Benefit Cost Type
description: This value set defines a set of codes that indicate the cost for a particular benefit on a plan.
